reviews.review_msg: She is a phenomenal professor who has truly mastered teaching. Despite FREN222 covering lots of content I found to be difficult, Paola managed to make these topics seem simple, logical, and approachable. Her constant feedback and many practice problems helped me succeed on exams and writes. Exams were fair and were similar to practice problems.
Paola is one of the professors I've ever had, I would take another class with her in a heart beat. She is wonderful.

She's probably the best prof in the French department. Puts together lectures really well, and is engaging, lots of socializing in class so u make lots of friends! But, she's a tough grader, and she expects you to know certain French rules that we wouldn't know already since French isn't our first language! Also, she can be sassy in her emails.

Paola is lovely - she's very kind, friendly, and easygoing. She makes sure that everyone understands and is always very helpful. Material was presented clearly. Tests and assignments were straightforward, and her expectations and feedback were always extremely clear and fair. Great prof! I would take her classes again.
